definition: to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw
to add sb to one's blacklist (on a cellphone, or in instant messaging software etc)/abbr. for 拉到黑名單|拉到黑名单
"zombie fans", fake followers that can be bought to boost one's popularity on Weibo, Baidu etc
to send to multiple recipients/mass mailout/to occur in a clustered fashion
to campaign for votes/to ask voters for support
Weixin or WeChat (mobile text and voice messaging service developed by Tencent 騰訊|腾讯[Teng2 xun4])
to expel (a member of an organization)/to fire (an employee)
to reply to an invitation/(Internet) to post a comment on a forum topic
Moments (social networking function of smartphone app WeChat 微信[Wei1 xin4])
tweet (on Twitter)/(HK, Tw) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/to reply to original poster (or recommend a post) on PTT bulletin board
(slang) (lit.) to tear cunt/(fig.) (of females) to have a catfight/to have a bitch fight
